title: Former MAFS stars Carly Bowyer and Sean Thomsen are spotted cosying up at a Grand Final party
text:
There was a mini Married At First Sight reunion at an NRL Grand Final party in Melbourne on Friday.

Last year's stars Carly Bowyer and Sean Thomsen were spotted getting friendly as they celebrated at Pontoon in St Kilda ahead of Sunday's big game.

The former co-stars happily posed for photos as they sat close together on a bench, and were seen sharing a laugh as they caught up.

Friends indeed: There was a mini Married At First Sight reunion at an NRL Grand Final party in Melbourne on Friday, with Carly Bowyer and Sean Thomsen catching up

Clutching a drink in one hand, Carly, 33, beamed up at the camera as she leaned in towards her 35-year-old co-star.

Carly looked chic in a white off-the-shoulder cropped milkmaid blouse, which showed off her toned midriff.

She paired it with a nude leather look miniskirt, which featured a split up one side.

Happy together: The former co-stars happily posed for photos as they sat close together on a bench, and were seen sharing a laugh as they caught up

Her long blonde hair was worn in loose waves, and she opted for natural looking makeup.

Meanwhile, Sean opted for a black T-shirt, which he wore with a black jacket, blue jeans and black Wayfarer sunglasses.

Although Carly and Sean were paired with other people on the show, they appear to have formed a close bond.

Close friends: Although Carly and Sean were paired with other people on the show, they appear to have formed a close bond

Carly was coupled with Justin Fischer, before famously leaving him and taking up with Troy Delmege, who she split with in August last year.

Meanwhile, Sean was paired with Blair Rachel, but their relationship proved to be short-lived.

He then took up with fellow MAFS star Tracey Jewel, who he split from in May last year.
description: There was a mini Married At First Sight reunion at an NRL Grand Final party in Melbourne on Friday.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
